phrase.item: Unfortunately, you have died in this desert, far from your homeland and separate from your mother, you died.
You didn't write even one letter for your mother. In this steppe you have died full of dreams and sorrow.
Unfortunately you have died at a young [age], in this bed of death you have died helpless.
You said, "May I not die until I travel the world," your wishes stayed inside you and you have died at the end.
Russian is strange, the country of Russia is strange, you got sick and couldn't find a doctor.
Where are your mother and sister, where is a close relative? Other strangers don't care that you are a stranger there.
Oh my dear daughter you have despised me, left me cruelly for others' daughters.
When we were together, we were always happy, you have died and made me lie flat on the ground.
